thread.title: Kanye West Receives Praise for Defending Bianca Censori After SA Incident | Real 106.1 | Papa Keith
thread.title_full: Kanye West Receives Praise for Defending Bianca Censori After SA Incident | Real 106.1 | Papa Keith

author: Papa Keith
title: Kanye West Receives Praise for Defending Bianca Censori After SA Incident | Real 106.1 | Papa Keith
text: Last night, reports emerged that Kanye West was a suspect in an alleged assault that occurred on Wednesday evening in Los Angeles. This was a significant story, with fans uncertain about its implications. Allegedly, Bianca Censori was grabbed, leading to the accusations against Ye. However, Yeezy Chief of Staff Milo Yiannopoulos countered these claims, stating that the incident was different from initial reports. According to him, Censori was sexually assaulted when a man attempted to grab under her dress and blew kisses at her. Milo emphasized that the description of "A stranger grabbed Bianca" was insufficient, as she was physically assaulted. He detailed the assailant's actions, including grabbing her waist, spinning her around, and blowing kisses, resulting in her being battered and sexually assaulted. The allegations were deeply troubling, and our thoughts are with Censori during this time. Social media users expressed shock and promptly shared their reactions. Many supported Ye's alleged response, emphasizing zero tolerance for sexual assault. Further updates are expected, and we will provide new information as it unfolds. Share your thoughts on this matter in the comments below. Do you believe Kanye's coverage was unjust? What are your thoughts on the investigation's progress and potential outcomes? Keep it locked to 103.5 The Beat for more!
